Calculations for the Michaelis-Menton equation quiz.

## Data

```{r}
df <- data.frame(S=c(1.0, 5.0, 10, 25, 50, 100, 250, 1000),
                 V=c(1.3, 5.0, 8.0, 13, 15, 17, 19, 20))
```

```{r stats}
df$recS <- 1/df$S
mean(df$recS)
df$recV <- 1/df$V
mean(df$recV)
(lmRes <- lm(recV ~ recS, data=df))
(Vmax <- 1/coef(lmRes)[1])
(Km <- Vmax * coef(lmRes)[2])
```
